articles.title: Falcon and The Winter Soldier Showrunner Working on Captain America 4 - ComingSoon.net
articles.description: Marvel is bringing back the Captain America film franchise. Per a report from The Hollywood Reporter, Disney and Marvel are having Malcolm Spellman develop the fourth installment in the series, which is tentatively called Captain America 4.
